mail_test_player.MailContent: 用于测试发送给指定玩家的邮件

mail_wormhole_reward.MailContent: Congrats! You earned these rewards from Lv. {0} Wormhole:

mail_treasure_award_dig_success.MailContent: Congrats! You've successfully retrieved the Omnium collector placed by {0}. Please claim the reward.

mail_treasure_award_bury_success.MailContent: Congrats! The Omnium collector you placed at ({0}) is filled with Omnium now. Please claim the reward.

mail_title_treasure_award_bury_failed.MailContent: Your backpack was full when the mission was completed. Rewards have been sent to your mailbox. Please collect them.

mail_exam_awards.MailContent: Backpack full. Please free up more space. Here is your quiz reward:

SoloLeagueParticipateAward.MailContent: Backpack full. Apex League participation reward has been sent to your mailbox:

SoloLeagueDailyWinAward.MailContent: Backpack full. Apex League daily victory reward has been sent to your mailbox:

TeamCloneFlopAward.MailContent: Backpack full. Instance card flip reward has been sent to your mailbox:

TeamCloneFirstAward.MailContent: Backpack full. Instance first clearance reward has been sent to your mailbox:

TeamCloneAward.MailContent: Backpack full. Instance clearance reward has been sent to your mailbox:

mail_case_open_awards.MailContent: Backpack full. The reward has been sent to your mailbox.

mail_astral_plane.MailContent: Backpack full. The reward has been sent to your mailbox.

mail_treasure_map.MailContent: Backpack full. Omnium collector signals mailed. Don't forget to claim them.

mail_item_use.MailContent: Backpack full. Reward has been sent to your mailbox.

TeamWorldBossRankAwardMail.MailContent: Congrats! Your team's highest ranking in Abyss Invasion is {0}. Here is your reward:

GuildWorldBossRankAwardMail.MailContent: Congrats! The highest ranking of your Crew {1} in Abyss Invasion is {0}. Here is your reward:

BuyCombatAwardCertificate.MailContent: Upgrade Pass for following bonus rewards.

ReceiveCombatAward.MailContent: Your Pass has expired, here are your unclaimed rewards.

mail_rewardquest_activity_awards.MailContent: You have unclaimed Bounty Mission activity rewards. It has been automatically sent to your mailbox. Don't forget to claim it.

mail_quest_main.MailContent: Backpack full. Mission reward has been sent to your mailbox.

mail_quest_submit_awards.MailContent: Your backpack was full when the mission was completed. Rewards have been sent to your mailbox. Please collect them.

WorldBoss_solo_2.MailContent: Congrats! You've won 90 points from Abyss Invasion!

WorldBoss_solo_3.MailContent: Congrats! You've won 150 points from Abyss Invasion!

WorldBoss_solo_4.MailContent: Congrats! You've won 250 points from Abyss Invasion!

FB_TeamMail.MailContent: Backpack full. Stage clearance reward has been sent to your mailbox:

mail_map_point_active.MailContent: Backpack full. Activation reward has been sent to your mailbox:

mail_Wormhole_full.MailContent: Backpack full. Wormhole first clear reward has been sent to your mailbox.

TradeItemBuy.MailContent: Backpack full. Trade items have been sent to your mailbox.

mail_tradeline_rush_fail.MailContent: Trading item purchase failed. Currency has been refunded.

FB_TeamCloneTreasure.MailContent: You haven't claimed your leader reward for Joint Operation {0}. It has been sent retroactively. Don't forget to check your mailbox:

FB_VoidCloneMail.MailContent: Void Rift stage clearance reward sent retroactively. Don't forget to check your mailbox:

FB_VoidCloneMailFriend.MailContent: Void Rift friend bonus reward sent retroactively. Don't forget to check your mailbox:

guild_answer_champion.MailContent: Congrats on winning first place in the Crew Mega Brain Test. You've obtained a 1-week title: Dr. Mega Brain.

PassSingleClone.MailContent: Backpack full. Stage clearance reward has been sent to your mailbox.

mail_common.MailContent: Backpack full. Please free up more space.

RecoverAwardMail.MailContent: Backpack full. Recovery reward has been sent to your mailbox.

mail_feed_lucky.MailContent: Congrats! You've won Tata grand prize in the Lucky Feast. The reward has been sent. Don't forget to check your mailbox.

mail_feed_select.MailContent: Congrats! The Wanderer you liked has won Tata grand prize in the Lucky Feast. The reward has been sent. Don't forget to check your mailbox.

mail_yahaha_awards.MailContent: Backpack full. Black nucleus reward has been sent to your mailbox.

mail_case_award_list.MailContent: You haven't picked up the items you found. They have been sent retroactively. Don't forget to check your mailbox:

big_secret_award_mail.MailContent: Backpack full. Bygone Phantasm reward has been sent to your mailbox.

big_secret_award_mail_bufa.MailContent: Bygone Phantasm weekly leaderboard reward sent retroactively. Don't forget to check your mail:

mail_random_idolum.MailContent: Backpack full. Sequence Phantasm reward has been sent to your mailbox.

mail_random_idolum_before_reset.MailContent: Sequence Phantasm unclaimed rewards from last week have been reissued. Don't forget to claim it:

GameShopRecommend.MailContent: Backpack full. Gift pack has been sent to your mailbox.

GameShopGift.MailContent: Backpack full. Gift pack has been sent to your mailbox.

HookCloneAward.MailContent: Backpack full. Dimensional Trials stage clearance reward has been sent to your mailbox:

mail_King_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: Are you kiddin' me? It's already been a year!? Wait... How much interest do I owe from last year? Ugh... How am I supposed to pay this off!?

mail_King_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: So something good is supposed to happen to you if you put money under the pillow before going to bed? Ha... like it's going to double or what?

mail_King_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: I feel as though the people who look forward to this holiday all have plans for me...

mail_King_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: The others say I'm well fitted in scaring other people... What are they playing at? Scaring other people to get what they want... That's extortion, isn't it!?

mail_King_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: Well, there's no need to use any holiday as an excuse to have a feast.

mail_King_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: So there's at least one day of the year where you actually cut loose, huh? Don't you ever get bored of keeping yourself under control all the time?

mail_King_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: You don't have to pick a specific day to burn all your savings in one go... But today isn't a bad pick, either!

mail_Cobalt-B_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: I've prepared some fireworks for a new year's celebration, a proper way to start the year. We should go to some open space before we begin; modifying this launcher's structure was no easy task, but the effect should be quite impressive.

mail_Cobalt-B_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: You should have some chocolates just like everyone else. A little bit of chocolate now and then is good for inspiration.

mail_Cobalt-B_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: Listening to the sound of firecrackers crackling outside... I have a new idea again... If I can think more about things like enhancing the firepower of firearms...

mail_Cobalt-B_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: I took the liberty of modifying your Suppressor while you were asleep last night. It should automatically dismantle into 500 tiny droids sometime before noon today. Have fun!

mail_Cobalt-B_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: It's not interesting enough to have people wearing new clothes. Let's also give everyone's weapons an eerie thematic paint.

mail_Cobalt-B_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: When I have sufficient technology, I think I should be able to make... There are as many accessories and plug-ins as the lanterns and festoons hung up, but the machine should still be easy to use. It's just that I'm not cultivated enough to do that yet.

mail_Cobalt-B_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: My gut tells me that today is your birthday, is that right? You never told me the actual date, but I have a feeling it's today. Anyways, happy birthday.

mail_Cobalt-B_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Flappy reminded me this morning that today is my birthday, and I've totally forgotten about it since my family never celebrated it with me... Well, it's not like it matters at all...

mail_Cocoritter_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: Happy New Year! The decorations outside are amazing! Come on, let's go take a look!

mail_Cocoritter_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: Um, it looks like everyone is exchanging gifts today... I have one for you, but I am not sure if you'll like it...

mail_Cocoritter_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: 5, 4, 3, 2, 1. It's time! Happy New Year! It's a new year starting. Let's live it together!

mail_Cocoritter_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: If you're going to pull a prank on me, could you not disappear like this...?

mail_Cocoritter_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: Trick or treat! Actually... a cake will do it.

mail_Cocoritter_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: Brrrr! It's snowing outside! Can we watch the snowfall together? It means a lot to me if we could.

mail_Cocoritter_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Heehee! Happy birthday! Wanna spend the day chillin' with me?

mail_Cocoritter_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Yay! Everybody gets a special wish on their birthday. Cocoritter's wish will be to stay with you the entire day, is that alright?

mail_Claudia_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: I have set the timer on the second for the New Year! Hopefully, I'll be the first to wish you a happy new year!

mail_Claudia_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: I have a special gift for you today, so please make sure you have a happy day and every day after that.

mail_Claudia_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: I was going to tuck the surprise under your pillow, but then I thought you're probably not going to behave and go to sleep tonight. So sending you a mail like this means you'll definitely see my blessing as soon as the time comes. Happy New Year.

mail_Claudia_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: Whoa, you need to pay special attention today. Be careful when you walk and talk. Also, be careful when friends invite you. You need to watch out whether promises are real or not. In short, you need to be careful in everything.

mail_Claudia_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: There are supposed to be lots of little devils running around tonight... But don't worry, I'll protect you.

mail_Claudia_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: Have you finished preparing for today? If you need my help, just call me!

mail_Claudia_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: I only hope that you find happiness in this broken world every day of your life. Happy birthday.

mail_Claudia_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: I didn't think you would remember my birthday... Does that mean I can expect you to spend every birthday with me from now on?

mail_Zero_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: Bored... Why not play a game with me?

mail_Zero_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: I love that today everyone will receive blessings from others. You will, too, won't you?

mail_Zero_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: How puerile. Only children would like such a dumb festival.

mail_Zero_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: What on earth is this holiday meant to be? People keep knocking and begging for candy! It's so annoying!

mail_Zero_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: Happy holidays. Let's celebrate it today.

mail_Zero_PlayerBirthday.MailContent:
\ \ \ \ \ \ \
Happy Birthday!
\ \

mail_Zero_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Consider it in return for the birthday gift. Do take it.

mail_Meryl_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: Another year, another opportunity to work together for a better future.

mail_Meryl_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: I got the chocolate you sent me, and this is for you. Is there... A special reason why everyone sends chocolate to each other today?

mail_Meryl_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: Spring is here. Although the snow and ice will disappear, everything will be revived...

mail_Meryl_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: I... I love you... (They told me to write this, and that your reaction would be hilarious after reading it). Jack-in-the-boxes, fake bugs, slime balls, and screaming puppets... This is such a strange holiday, yet everyone seems to enjoy it so much. I even saw a person cry from the shock; it must have been quite interesting.

mail_Meryl_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: What a strange day... When all of these enemies appeared on the street, my first instinct was to cut them all down, but then they started giving me candies... I have no idea why...

mail_Meryl_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: It was snowing during the day and everyone was happy. I heard that we need to exchange gifts today. Maybe I should give you my gift first.

mail_Meryl_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Someone once told me that a person's birthday is an extremely important day, so I prepared a gift for you. I hope you like it.

mail_Meryl_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Thank you for always standing at my side.

mail_Samir_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: It's a new year again. I wish you a year full of adventures and fortuitous meetings, and I'm glad to be able to continue to keep you company.

mail_Samir_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: I hear that today is a special day, so I took some time to prepare a gift just for you. Hmm? You want to know if it's a prank? That's for you to find out...

mail_Samir_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: It's been a long time since I've had such a heartwarming night. Your company is appreciated. It should be the new year already by now. Happy New Year.

mail_Samir_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: Of course it was a prank... You should've seen the look on your face!

mail_Samir_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: How would you like to dress up? If you ask me, I will choose something really clever...

mail_Samir_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: Looks like today is a cause for celebration. Hope you spend the holiday well!

mail_Samir_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Happy birthday. I promise I won't pull any pranks on you today, so you don't have to worry about anything... Especially not this gift.

mail_Samir_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: My birthday? I don't really care much about it, but the chance to enjoy it with someone is a novel experience, indeed...

mail_Hane_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: Happy New Year! What an exciting day, huh? I can't wait to see what is waiting ahead for us.

mail_Hane_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: I've sent out plenty of giri choco; let's switch it up this time?

mail_Hane_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: I've heard an old tale! There's an incredible monstrosity that only appears at certain times, and loud enough noise has to be made in order to scare it away. Won't you come and chat until daybreak?

mail_Hane_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: After giving it a lot of thought, I've decided that it's time for us to go our separate ways. Don't be surprised; I'm sure someone as smart as you knew this would come sooner or later! Consider this fairwell my final act of friendship; the next time we see each other, it might be as enemies...

mail_Hane_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: This is my favorite holiday of the year! Oh, and just so you know, I prefer bubble gum over any other kind of candy! Now hand it over!

mail_Hane_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: I had been busy preparing a small gift for everyone today, so inevitably... the gifts are kind of simple. Ha-ha. I hope you don't mind!

mail_Hane_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Happy birthday! It's today, isn't it? Heh, it doesn't matter, we could celebrate anyway. Come on, let's get everyone together for a birthday party! We could always use a birthday party!

mail_Hane_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Huh? Why's everyone wishing me a happy birthday all of a sudden? Wait... They didn't check the Hykros archive, did they? He-he-he... Should I tell them I made that up in the archive?

mail_Hilda_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: Yoo-hoo! It's the New Year again. Happy New Year! It's very lively outside. Come on! Come on!

mail_Hilda_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: It looks like we're supposed to give our friends gifts today, and you're the first person I thought of! Here, have this!

mail_Hilda_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: Happy White Day! I must be the first one to send you my best wishes! By the way, Grandma sent me some good stuff. I also prepared one for you!

mail_Hilda_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: Please don't bust me when I pull the prank today. Pretty please?

mail_Hilda_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: A specter that haunts the skies of Banges... That's my idea for the Halloween costume this year! What do you think?

mail_Hilda_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: We're supposed to get together with everyone today, aren't we? I have prepared some presents! Please show up on time!

mail_Hilda_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Happy birthday! I'm not great with words, but... I'm really glad to have met you! Er... Th-That's all I got, so have a good one!

mail_Hilda_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Wow, you remembered my birthday! In that case, could I ask you for a present? I don't want much, but could you hang out with me in Banges today for my birthday?

mail_Shiro_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: It's been a year already, huh... Here, I made this for you. Even though you still have a lot to learn as a partner, I'm... I'm not opposed to giving you a few pointers every now and then if you treat me nicely... A-Anyways, happy new year! I look forward to working with you...

mail_Shiro_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: D-Don't get the wrong idea! It's just a gift, nothing else! HQ monitors the interactions between the AIs and their partners, so... I-It's just another part of my mission, understand? Anyways... Um... Happy holidays...?

mail_Shiro_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: I... I wish you good luck and prosperity. I-It has no special meaning! I just hope your life will be better in the coming year...

mail_Shiro_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: What a pointless holiday... Why do people even bother with this one? Ahem... Ahem... A-Anyways, did you know that sea cows... Aren't cows at all? Ehe-he... D-Do you get it?

mail_Shiro_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: They say strangers are allowed to come knocking on your door today... S-So, could I hide out in your room for a while? Just for one night, I promise!

mail_Shiro_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: Happy Holidays... I'm not exactly into this holiday, but I heard that many people choose this day to da... da... so I wanted to ask you if... if... Never mind!

mail_Shiro_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: The system says that it's your birthday today, so I went to the warehouse and found some junk... Er, I mean a present... I, uh... Oh, forget it! You should've told me sooner! Next time, you have to remember to give me a notice a few days in advance!

mail_Shiro_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: N-Now that you mention it, today is a very special day... That's why I found a nice, isolated reef on the beach to hide at, so that no one would come to bother me. I-It's not like I want you to come to find me or anything! I just thought I should tell you, so you don't worry about me... U-Understand?

mail_Huma_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: Happy New Year. May all of your wishes come true...

mail_Huma_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: I hope everyone is able to express their true feelings today... I prepared something for you as well, as a token of my gratitude for all that you've done for me.

mail_Huma_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: Happy New Year. It was a pleasure to spend New Year's Eve with you. Did you make any New Year's resolution that you would like to follow through on? I was wondering if I could help... My resolution? I've followed through on it already.

mail_Huma_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: I'm not very good at coming up with tricks, but I still like this day for some unknown reasons. Why...

mail_Huma_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: The children look like they're having a lot of fun. I wish I could join them... Oh, would you like these? Just remember not to eat too many.

mail_Huma_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: I wish you a blessed and tranquil night.

mail_Huma_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Happy birthday. I am grateful for the day you were born.

mail_Huma_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: To be honest, I have very little recollection of my own birthday; this is simply a commemoration of the day I "woke up," according to the Hykros doctors.

mail_Xi_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: Happy New Year, sent right on time! I hope I can be there for you this year too, right at the vanguard!

mail_Xi_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: I have found myself... Depending on you more and more...

mail_Xi_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: I can sense everyone's happy! I would like to spend this holiday with everyone, too!

mail_Xi_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: While my smart systems can detect whether people are lying, I think I will turn this function off and just enjoy the day with everyone! Come on then, who's gonna fall for my tricks!?

mail_Xi_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: These spoils I managed to snatch are now aaaall yooouuurs!

mail_Xi_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: This is for you! Would you like to go with me to hand out gifts?

mail_Xi_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Happy birthday! Isn't this one of the most important days for you humans? I hope I can celebrate it with you every year!

mail_Xi_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Ohh, I can celebrate human things like birthdays too? And today is my birthday!? One year older, one year wiser! Thank you for your good wishes!

mail_ag_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: I, Echo, am a wandering Wastewalker. Gently I go. Not even a wisp of cloud will I bring away. So this is righteousness! It's righteousness. Don't get any ideas.

mail_ag_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: Today is a day to celebrate! In some places, people would take out the foods they have saved throughout the year and gather around for a big meal on this day!

mail_ag_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: Everyone told me I can believe anyone today, so that's what I'm going to do!

mail_ag_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: Are these the dark days of demons? But where are the demons? I will strike them down!

mail_ag_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: I, Echo, love today. It's a day of ice and snow! But even today, one must not stop dispensing justice!

mail_ag_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Today is your birthday! Make the most of it and enjoy yourself. I will protect you!

mail_ag_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Eh? It's my birthday today? Thank you so much for the gift! It's been so long since I've celebrated my birthday, I'm so happy!

mail_ww_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: New day, new year! Let's work even better together!

mail_ww_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: The theme of the Chinese New Year performance has been decided! Let's make a good start with firecrackers!

mail_ww_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: I always thought this festival was supposed to be for clown shows, but it doesn't seem that way when you think about it, so just have fun and enjoy.|

mail_ww_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: How could anyone like a festival full of ghost stories!?... It's terrifying...

mail_ww_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: I've been too busy today. I almost forgot to send you a gift. I always receive a lot of performance invitations every time there's a festival like this. Ha-ha.

mail_ww_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Everyone says today's my special day, which can only mean... That they all want to see my spectacular solo performance! I need some time to get ready, but you better be there, too!

mail_ww_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Every day should be a happy day!

mail_bl_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: I, Bai Ling, would like to wish you good luck for the coming year.

mail_bl_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: May you have a happy and fulfilling day.

mail_bl_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: I hope you enjoy the festival today, and that you're not tricked by anyone. Happy April Fool's Day.

mail_bl_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: Trick or treat! Did I say it right?

mail_bl_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: The surrounding area has been decorated with glittering decorations. How lively!

mail_bl_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: It's Bai Ling's birthday today, but I shouldn't go overboard with it, and I should find a thrifty, low-key way to celebrate.

mail_bl_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Happy birthday, my lord! Today is a very special day for you; may every single day of yours be as wonderful as today!

mail_peppa_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: My new year's resolution is for there to be a new breakthrough in medical research! Only... Is it wrong for me to wish for something that has nothing to do with what I have to do?

mail_peppa_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: May you have some great encounters today. ^_^

mail_peppa_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: There is a happy atmosphere of family reunion everywhere... Did you also get together with your family today?

mail_peppa_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: As someone in the medical field, making jokes and keeping others happy is also important... But if it means scaring people or playing pranks on them, I think I should stay out of it.

mail_peppa_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: There's nothing wrong with having fun, but always remember to do it safely.

mail_peppa_Christmas_Festival.MailContent:
"If you keep your eyes open, you won't get a gift!" That's what my dad used to tell me.
So rest early, too. Sweet dreams. ^_^

mail_peppa_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Preset Message: Happy birthday! I didn't want to miss being the first to wish you a happy birthday because I was sleeping, so I recorded this message to be sent to you at midnight! Um... Did it work?

mail_peppa_Birthday_imitation.MailContent:
I haven't cared about my birthday for a long time now. Whenever I thought about it, I always upset myself...
But thanks to my travels with you, my birthday doesn't feel so lonely this year. Thank you for being at my side...

ReturnRedEnvelopeFragmentMail.MailContent: The shards you sent have been refunded.

mail_world_boss_box_awards.MailContent: Frontier Clash boss chest reward sent retroactively. Don't forget to check your mailbox:

MailFirstRecharge.MailContent: Backpack full. Gift pack has been sent to your mailbox.

change_role_name_by_gm.MailContent: Dear Wanderer, we've renamed your character due to sensitive content in its name.

mail_Meryl_random1.MailContent: I don't know why, but there's been a lot of errors with Rosy recently. I wonder if it's because I've been negligent with my practice...

mail_Meryl_random2.MailContent: I inexplicably really like this sentence from the book you gave me: "Cowards are afraid of happiness. They even hurt themselves on silk, so happiness can likewise hurt them too."

mail_Meryl_random3.MailContent: Recently, weather data has been... Unstable. Be sure to take care.

mail_Meryl_random4.MailContent: Claudia... Last time... I responded to her greeting. I wonder if I did it right.

mail_Meryl_random5.MailContent: As thanks for last time, this is for you.

mail_Meryl_random6.MailContent: While no two snowflakes are the same, why do they all have the same general shape...?

mail_Meryl_random7.MailContent: Broken fragments of memories keep welling up... It makes me feel uneasy. I... I don't understand...

mail_Meryl_random8.MailContent: I don't usually use this, as I have no reason to. What's it called again? Mail?

mail_Meryl_random9.MailContent: The instructions said that you had to type something to send an attachment. So I typed this.

mail_Meryl_random10.MailContent: This means of communication is so different than using language. I'm still finding it quite tricky.

mail_Samir_random1.MailContent: Out surfing in Banges, unable to reply. If I'm in a good mood, I might even bring you back a souvenir.

mail_Samir_random2.MailContent: I heard someone mention you while conducting some business near the Astra Shelter. I never thought you would be so well-received, even out here.

mail_Samir_random3.MailContent: Gazing into the distance from high above... I've gotten pretty tired of the sight, to be honest. When are we going to see the view from atop the Tower of Fantasy?

mail_Samir_random4.MailContent: As for my surprise... Ah, it's better if you just take it. It's nothing new, after all.

mail_Samir_random5.MailContent: Care to help me practice a bit? You'll be the target, of course... But you can choose whatever you want to put on your head!

mail_Samir_random6.MailContent: Aiming would be my first reaction when hearing someone says "heart." Maybe I am a little too merciless sometimes... Sorry, the thought just kind of came to me...

mail_Samir_random7.MailContent: Yo! I found some pretty interesting ruins to explore; we can go check them out next time, if you'd like?

mail_Samir_random8.MailContent: If I go missing someday, will you come searching for me? Oh, I don't have any plans to disappear at the moment! I'm just asking, is all...

mail_Samir_random9.MailContent: How have you been lately? I hope every day holds new adventures for you.

mail_Samir_random10.MailContent: It was a pain making a meal with that dancing pot, so you better eat it all. I'll be watching...

mail_Huma_random1.MailContent: Nut tea always gives me a warm, happy feeling. I thought you might enjoy it, too.

mail_Huma_random2.MailContent: I really want to share my cooking with others, so I've been reading all kinds of recipes. Hmm... How should I prepare these ingredients once I've gathered them, I wonder?

mail_huma_random3.MailContent: I read about our planet's history in one of my books. The passing of time, the evolution of species... The span of our existence is a blink of an eye compared to the history of the world.

mail_huma_random4.MailContent: Seeing the plants stretch out towards the warmth of the sun... That's life, isn't it? Vibrant, resilient, and full of energy... There's strength and softness all around us, huh?

mail_huma_random5.MailContent: I really enjoy the use of letters as a form of communication. If I could send you a letter, I know I would enjoy every part of it, from writing it all the way to sealing the envelope...

mail_huma_random6.MailContent: Attached is a list of items destroyed by my "powers". Once again, I would like to thank you for agreeing to pay for these damages... Just kidding! Of course nothing like that happened; I just wanted to see how you would react if I said that to you...

mail_huma_random7.MailContent: I feel an indescribable sense of peace whenever I go to the beach and look out towards the ocean. Sitting above the reefs and listening to the tide, it feels as though time has slowed down a little. If you're ever feeling stressed, we could always go to the beach together and relax for a while?

mail_huma_random8.MailContent: Books are wonderful, but they aren't enough if I truly want to understand this world. If you don't mind, I'd like to share every chapter on this planet with you...

mail_huma_random9.MailContent: If you ever have some spare time, would you like to go on a picnic with me? I saw a perfect place in a field of flowers on my last walk...

mail_huma_random10.MailContent: I really enjoy coloring books... Is that immature of me? It's so much fun, matching shapes and colors... The idea of filling a picture with color really makes me feel calm.

mail_Shiro_random1.MailContent: Oh... Does this count as sending something with an attachment?

mail_Shiro_random2.MailContent: I hope you always remain as diligent as you are now.

mail_Shiro_random3.MailContent: "Have a cup of tea before you go..." You would never hear me saying that. But if you insist...

mail_Shiro_random4.MailContent: I'm taking a walk on the beach right now... D-Don't you dare come find me!

mail_Shiro_random5.MailContent: The "Fishing Net" is the device I use to detect rare sea creatures. It sends an alert immediately when it finds something; even if I'm asleep, the alert wakes me right up... Which is fine.

mail_Shiro_random7.MailContent: I know I've already approved and endorsed you in the past, but making no progress by just staying put does no good for you, so...

mail_Shiro_random8.MailContent: I-I accidentally sent my last mail without finishing it again! Let me try to retrieve it! You... You didn't happen to read it, did you?

mail_Shiro_random9.MailContent: I-I didn't prepare this for you because I thought you might need it! I just had a few lying around, is all...

mail_Shiro_random10.MailContent: Dried starfish have a peculiar odor... I suppose shells are a much better gift idea, after all.

mail_Claudia_random1.MailContent: Which do you want to hear first, the good news or the bad news? The good news is that I finished organizing all of the mission data! The bad news is, well... I kind of accidentally deleted it all... So just give me a minute to do it again, and I'll have it for you soon! Why don't you take a break in the meantime?

mail_Claudia_random2.MailContent: I found this while out patrolling Hykros. It's quite interesting so I thought you might like it.

mail_Claudia_random3.MailContent: You won't believe what happened! I just said hi to Meryl, and she nodded at me! It's gonna be a great day today!

mail_Claudia_random4.MailContent: You remember that scammer I caught the other day? That one who was conning old ladies out of their life savings? Well, I've seen him again while out on patrol, finally working hard, it seems. I hope he has turned over a new leaf.

mail_Claudia_random5.MailContent:
Σ'αγαπ... Isn't this such a mysterious mark?
I recently discovered it on a rock while at work. It looks like some kind of writing, and definitely piqued my curiosity! Maybe I could ask Zero to help me look into it.

mail_Claudia_random6.MailContent: Thank you so much for your gift last time! I really like it! I got this for you in return.

mail_Claudia_random7.MailContent: There's been a lot of unrest around Hykros recently. Stay alert and stay safe if you have to go there for missions. Let me know if you have any questions.

mail_Claudia_random8.MailContent: The weather's been changeable recently, so be sure to dress appropriately!

mail_Claudia_random9.MailContent: Are you free one of these days? I hope you remember what we agreed... Let's find a time to go to the Hykros Medical Department!

mail_Claudia_random10.MailContent: I got you some gifts when I was away, don't forget to check them out!

mail_Cobalt-B_random1.MailContent: This was left over. Do you want it?

mail_Cobalt-B_random2.MailContent: Always remember to maintain your weapons every day.

mail_Cobalt-B_random3.MailContent: Never fail on the weapons that fight for you.

mail_Cobalt-B_random4.MailContent: Whenever you are free, bring me your device so I can take a look at it.

mail_Cobalt-B_random5.MailContent: Flappy has gone missing again... Keep an eye out for me, will you? Thanks.

mail_Cobalt-B_random6.MailContent: This is one of my favorites. A little spice is good for inspiration, too.

mail_Cobalt-B_random7.MailContent: I have a good feeling about this. I'm not sure what will happen next, but you can definitely look forward to it.

mail_Cobalt-B_random8.MailContent: If a weapon feels somewhat off, hold it in your hands for a few seconds; a weapon's weight and feel are a great place to begin troubleshooting. If it simply feels out of place in your hands, it's a sign that you should order a new or different weapon.

mail_Cobalt-B_random9.MailContent: Are you interested in modifying and reinforcing your own weapons? This kind of component has plenty of different uses.

mail_Cobalt-B_random10.MailContent: I performed some maintenance and cleaning on your vehicles. Hopefully, it will make your journey a little bit more enjoyable.

mail_Cocoritter_random1.MailContent: I'm off to make paper airplanes with a group of local kids. Wanna tag along?

mail_Cocoritter_random2.MailContent: I'm sorry! I screwed up the baking, so you'll have to wait until next time for your cake. I hope this will make it up for you...

mail_Cocoritter_random3.MailContent: I'm not very good at surfing, you know... I fell again today, but don't worry! I'm totally fine!

mail_Cocoritter_random4.MailContent: Ding ding ding! Today on Cocoritter's menu: fruit cake! Want a bite?

mail_Cocoritter_random5.MailContent: I have a little surprise for you? Huh? You're wondering why I got you a gift? Hmm... To celebrate the start of a new day, I guess?

mail_Cocoritter_random6.MailContent: While marching through the snowfield, I thought about a lot of serious stuff that I usually don't think about...

mail_Cocoritter_random7.MailContent: Fruits are essential for getting your daily vitamins! Here, have some!

mail_Cocoritter_random8.MailContent: I heard there's an amusement park somewhere in Navia... I really want to check it out? Think we can go next time?

mail_Cocoritter_random9.MailContent: Hello! I'm here in Astra right now, and the scenery is amazing! I wish I could send you a postcard!

mail_Cocoritter_random10.MailContent: Yay! I had a feeling you needed something like this, so I rushed over to give it to you!

mail_Zero_random1.MailContent: Don't forget your promise to help me clear the stage.

mail_Zero_random2.MailContent: This is for you. It's not like I could use it, anyway.

mail_Zero_random3.MailContent:
Here's the information you asked me about the Angel of Clemency:
Records show that most of the test subjects involved in the Angel of Clemency project were forced to become aberrants, with a few over-zealous Heirs of Aida fanatics thrown in, who voluntarily underwent surgery to remove their dependency on suppressors.
The majority of the few who survived both their aberration and modification are women. However, the still-nascent technology meant that all surviving subjects still displayed some level of mental instability. Only a rare few were permitted to join the Heirs of Aida's elite "Angel of Clemency" unit.

mail_Zero_random4.MailContent: Σ'αγαπ is a word from an ancient language which means "love". You go explain that to Claudia, and tell her to leave me alone while you're at it...

mail_Zero_random5.MailContent: It would be fascinating to stick you in my game... That's settled then! Let's do it.

mail_Zero_random6.MailContent: That guy... Tsk, I meant, "me"... Anyway, if there's a problem, I'll take care of it.

mail_Zero_random7.MailContent: Hykros is about to test a new system. I'm letting you know in advance, so you don't have a heart attack when it happens.

mail_Zero_random8.MailContent: I can't believe you haven't come to talk my ear off recently.

mail_Zero_random9.MailContent: ..."Why are all snowflakes snowflake-shaped"... What kind of question is that? You're asking why snowflakes are hexagonal, right?... I know the answer to this question, but I can't tell you. Being able to find the answer... is what brings you happiness.

mail_Zero_random10.MailContent: If Joaquin comes looking for me, tell him I've gone missing.

mail_Hane_random1.MailContent: The first and most essential rule of surviving in the wilderness is knowing what's edible! Do you think it's safe to eat this mushroom?

mail_Hane_random2.MailContent: I caught this while I was out there hunting! Don't you think I should make a hot pot out of it? It'd be fun to share it with everyone!

mail_Hane_random3.MailContent: Want a taste? Don't worry, I didn't poison it or anything... Heehee!

mail_Hane_random4.MailContent: Another around of the hot pot dishes! Heh heh!

mail_Hane_random5.MailContent: I'm thinking of going to a restricted area with almost no reception, so this might be my last mail ever... Do you believe me?

mail_Hane_random6.MailContent: Food always tastes better when you share it with others! I'm the best kind of friend, aren't I?

mail_Hane_random7.MailContent: Yahoo! I got so much stuff I can't move it all by myself! Think you can give me a hand?

mail_Hane_random8.MailContent: ─=≡Σ(((つ○ω○)つ (Look at this text face! Isn't it cute? Wait... I'm not bothering you, am I?)

mail_Hane_random9.MailContent: ... I'm so bored, I'm about to lose it! Hurry! Come over and hang out for a bit!

mail_Hane_random10.MailContent: What are you doing right now? Searching for new partners while I'm not around you? Hmm, I am curious about what you found!

mail_King_random1.MailContent: I've been meaning to ask: what's with all the pointless gifts you keep giving me? You tryin' to keep me in your debt, so you can collect on it later on or something?

mail_King_random2.MailContent: Take this; it should make us even.

mail_King_random5.MailContent: What's our next target? Time is money, so hurry up and talk.

mail_King_random6.MailContent: Have you been having any problems lately?

mail_King_random7.MailContent: Just a heads-up: if anyone comes looking for us to settle any scores, stay out of it and let me do the talking.

mail_King_random8.MailContent: I'm feeling kinda antsy... Either give me something to train towards, or give me some money so I can splurge a little. I'll let you decide.

mail_King_random9.MailContent: We're even?...Eh, maybe I'm just remembering it differently, but if you say so...

mail_King_random10.MailContent: I made a little cash recently. How're things on your end?

mail_ww_random1.MailContent: I found something nice by chance, and thought it really suited you!

mail_ww_random2.MailContent: I feel so helpless every time I see a stray cat on the street... What should I do to help them?

mail_ww_random3.MailContent: Wow! Where did you get this copy of the "Aida Chronicles"? It's a limited print, you know? Thanks a bunch!

mail_ww_random4.MailContent: When are you free? Let's find a time to go to Banges together!

mail_ww_random5.MailContent: Don't forget you can always call on me!

mail_ww_random6.MailContent: The muse has left me these days! I cannot think of any good bad jokes. Do you have any?

mail_ww_random7.MailContent: Fennie's gotta be doing it on purpose! Why does she have to ask me to taste a new drink the second it's been released!? There's something fishy going on here.

mail_ww_random8.MailContent: I'm thinking of making "wild" the theme of my next show. What do you think?

mail_ww_random9.MailContent: We've begun to plan for a stray cat rescue station. We've reached a consensus on all aspects except for the naming.

mail_ww_random10.MailContent: Didn't you celebrate my successful performance last time? Well, this is in return!

mail_Xi_random1.MailContent: Don't forget to think, even in the midst of a battle!

mail_Xi_random2.MailContent: I'm looking forward to today's battles!

mail_Xi_random3.MailContent: Even I'm affected by Echo's awe-inspiring righteousness.

mail_Xi_random4.MailContent: I saw someone grilling fish by the side of the road! Oh, the smell was so delicious! It's those sorts of times which make me regret that my droid body can't eat. So, you'd all better eat more on my behalf!

mail_Xi_random5.MailContent: Someone called me cute again today. Am I really? If so, would being cute count as a type of combat strength!?

mail_Xi_random6.MailContent: While exploration is important, you mustn't forget to look after your health! I learned from one of my inherited memories that the old Ene always sought a healthy body to fulfill her aspirations.

mail_Xi_random7.MailContent: Hostiles spotted! But fear not, I can sort them out in a flash and be back before you know it!

mail_Xi_random8.MailContent: The look in Cobalt-B's eyes when she stared at me today gave me goosebumps. I should stay well away from her!

mail_Xi_random9.MailContent: Fight! Fight! More battles await today. I fight so much, I've got battling in my blood.

mail_Xi_random10.MailContent: I found that the air today is fresh and crisp! I hope you have a great day.

mail_Hilda_random1.MailContent: Mail is such a convenient way to communicate! I never have to worry about losing or forgetting anything this way! I can even attach stuff to my messages! If we had to go back to pen-and-paper, I don't think I'd get very far...

mail_Hilda_random2.MailContent: Argh! Not another full load today! I can't handle all of this by myself; gimme a hand, will you?

mail_Hilda_random3.MailContent: I just realized... If only I had wired headphones, so we could listen to my music together... Oh well, at least food is a lot easier to share! Help yourself!

mail_Hilda_random4.MailContent: How am I supposed to make food out of this!? I can't believe I'm getting owned by a tiny sea urchin...

mail_Hilda_random5.MailContent: This is some real Banges home cooking. Give it a try!

mail_Hilda_random6.MailContent: Uh, where do you go when you loaf on the job? I'll use it for reference. Well... Let me clean up my snacks first.

mail_Hilda_random7.MailContent: Whew! Another coin for another hard day's work! I'm in a great mood today, and you should be, too! Come on, let's go grab a bite to eat!

mail_Hilda_random8.MailContent: Whenever I can't find something I really need, I just pray for a miracle and start putting everything away in a hurry. Come on, where is it... Hey, would you look at that! See? Works like a charm!

mail_Hilda_random9.MailContent: I joined a race today! It was a race around all of Banges; even though I know this town like the back of my hand, it always feels different every time I see it. As for my placement... I got first place, of course! Here, you can have the trophy!

mail_Hilda_random10.MailContent: It's an art to make a good fried chicken, you know? Come try out my newest recipe! The cookbook is on track for publication, but what would I name it? Hmm...

mail_bl_random1.MailContent: I've received your gift. Thank you very much for your kindness. Please accept my gift in return.

mail_bl_random2.MailContent: Recent radiation monitoring reports indicate that the radiation index of the Navia is abnormal, so please pay attention to the status of the suppressor during the mission to prevent radiation contamination. Please feel free to contact me if you need anything.

mail_bl_random3.MailContent: Please take care of your health as the weather has been weird lately.

mail_bl_random4.MailContent: Here's a kind reminder. Spend rationally. Remember your promise to Bai Ling.

mail_bl_random5.MailContent: HT201 Shelter sent a message, hoping I could give it to you.

mail_bl_random6.MailContent: I prepared a brand-new batch of arrows for Nightingale. This should make it even more powerful!

mail_bl_random7.MailContent: I received this by chance a few days ago, but I believe it suits you much better, my lord.

mail_bl_random8.MailContent: I've been preparing a few new recipes lately. Care to act as my taste-tester?

mail_bl_random9.MailContent: You seem much more fatigued recently. I'm worried about you.

mail_bl_random10.MailContent: Resource allocation sounds like an easy job that you can let go of once you are done planning; in fact, lots of emergencies come up afterward... What a pain...

mail_peppa_random1.MailContent: Sorry for the interruption! I know it's kind of abrupt, but please accept this gift!

mail_peppa_random3.MailContent: Keeping healthy habits is the best medicine!

mail_peppa_random4.MailContent: If you don't show concern for the people you care about, you may live to regret it. This is something I always keep in mind...

mail_peppa_random5.MailContent: These are some highly-rated snacks from Prescott House. Hope you like them, too!

mail_peppa_random6.MailContent: Theoretically, this is supposed to improve sleep quality, but it didn't really work when I used it... Could there be something different about my body?

mail_peppa_random7.MailContent: To do: Give the Wanderer a present as a reward for all their hard work. Status: Complete!

mail_peppa_random8.MailContent: This was my mom's specialty, and I can only make half as good as hers... But I would still like you to try it!

mail_peppa_random9.MailContent: I still think that eating healthy, nutritious meals is the best kind of medicine for your body. Don't you agree?

mail_peppa_random10.MailContent: Remember to balance work and life. This is for you!

mail_ag_random1.MailContent: A surprise I found during my wanderings! Let me show you.

mail_ag_random2.MailContent: Hey! How are you feeling today?

mail_ag_random3.MailContent: My head's spinning from such a bumpy ride! I'm so dizzy I don't know which way's up...

mail_ag_random4.MailContent: Today is another day for punishing evil and promoting good! Come and be chivalrous with me!

mail_ag_random5.MailContent: Let's have a barbecue together tonight! I've already gathered the ingredients.

mail_ag_random6.MailContent: The road ahead is unknown, and yet I shall continue to walk it.

mail_ag_random7.MailContent: Freshly grilled fish! Just sprinkle some salt to lock in the juicy deliciousness... And you can have some too!

mail_ag_random8.MailContent: I like being appreciated for doing good deeds!

mail_ag_random9.MailContent: I'll cherish spending such joyous days with everyone!

mail_ag_random10.MailContent: I miss Granny Eileen. What about you? It's good to spend more time with family.

mail_feed.MailContent: Backpack full. Mi-a's Kitchen reward will be sent to the mailbox.

ExchangeWeaponLottery_4.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover flame gold (Red Lotus) have been converted into black gold. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeWeaponLottery_5.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover flame gold (Flame) have been converted into black gold. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeWeaponLottery_5_BYK.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover flame gold (White Moon) have been converted into black gold. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeWeaponLottery_6_MK.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover flame gold (Dawn) have been converted into black gold. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeWeaponLottery_7_NMXS.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover flame gold (Rebirth) have been converted into black gold. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeWeaponLottery_8_FLJ.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover flame gold (Ironheart) have been converted into black gold. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeWeaponLottery_9_LB.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover flame gold (Sun) have been converted into black gold. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeWeaponLottery_10_BPX.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover flame gold (Flow) have been converted into black gold. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeWeaponLottery_12_SME.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover flame gold: Trickery have been converted into black gold. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeArtifactLottery_3.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover overclocking chips: Red Lotus have been converted into base chips. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeArtifactLottery_4.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover overclocking chips: Flame have been converted into base chips. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeArtifactLottery_4_BYK.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover overclocking chips: White Moon have been converted into base chips. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeArtifactLottery_5_MK.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover overclocking chips: Dawn have been converted into base chips. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeArtifactLottery_6_NMXS.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover overclocking chips (Rebirth) have been converted into base chips. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeArtifactLottery_7_FLJ.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover overclocking chips (Ironheart) have been converted into base chips. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeArtifactLottery_8_LB.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover overclocking chips: Sun have been converted into the base chips. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeArtifactLottery_9_BPX.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover overclocking chips: Flow have been converted into base chips. Please check your inbox.

ExchangeArtifactLottery_11_SME.MailContent: Previous Limited Order has ended. Leftover overclocking chips (Trickery) have been converted into base chips. Please check your inbox.

mail_intruder_stage.MailContent: Backpack full. Rewards sent to mailbox.

mail_report_notice.MailContent: Dear Wanderer, the Hykros Central Monitor has received your report regarding【{0}】 and shall review the idle behavior through the system and administrators. If violation is confirmed, appropriate punitive measures will be doled out. Thank you for the report!

mail_transfer_server_change_item.MailContent: Due to the doubling up of character names, here is a special identity update card. Happy gaming!

mail_Nemesis_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: It's a new year. Maybe we'll make more progress this year...

mail_Nemesis_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: I tried to pour my gratitude to you into the chocolate...

mail_Nemesis_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: The breeze that heralds spring seems to be on its way.

mail_Nemesis_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: I'm thinking of teasing Mi-a, but I don't want to upset her too much... I need to play this out just right.

mail_Nemesis_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: I want to try on the wolf ears and then... howl! He-he, Mi-a will give me candy even if I don't do that.

mail_Nemesis_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: It would be great if I could have a peaceful dream today...

mail_Nemesis_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Happy birthday! Enjoy your special day today!

mail_Nemesis_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Although my birthday celebration isn't so lively today as you're the only one celebrating it with me... I'm just as happy as when I was still in the shelter.

mail_Nemesis_random1.MailContent: The synchronization rate seems to be quite stable lately.

mail_Nemesis_random2.MailContent: I used to be a trainee nurse, so I can do something as simple as being a caregiver.

mail_Nemesis_random3.MailContent: We're traveling together, so it's natural to look out for each other.

mail_Nemesis_random4.MailContent: Mi-a helped me make this... Do you want to try it?

mail_Nemesis_random5.MailContent: I had some more... disturbing dreams. I want to be with you for a while...

mail_Nemesis_random6.MailContent: What awaits us in the future?

mail_Nemesis_random7.MailContent: It's been a while since there was a rejection reaction. That's a good thing... right?

mail_Nemesis_random8.MailContent: I hope we'll be able to help each other.

mail_Nemesis_random9.MailContent: Have I become stronger than before? I feel like I'm getting more and more used to fighting...

mail_Nemesis_random10.MailContent: It's just a small gift... I know it's far from enough to repay you for everything you've done for me...

mail_Freyja_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: It's good to celebrate and commemorate events in daily life.

mail_Freyja_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: The tin man gave this to you. Do you like it?

mail_Freyja_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: Are you really bringing me with you? Okay... I'm coming.

mail_Freyja_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: I've prepared everything for you. Go off and have some fun. You don't need to bring me with you.

mail_Freyja_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: It's cold, so remember to stay warm. Me? Don't worry about me because I'm impervious to the cold.

mail_Freyja_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Go and celebrate your birthday! This day is really important to some "people."

mail_Freyja_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: Do you want to have a drink with me?

mail_Freyja_random1.MailContent: ...How is Nemesis today? Umm... I'm just curious about what she's doing right now.

mail_Freyja_random2.MailContent: Here are your spoils. Take them.

mail_Freyja_random3.MailContent: Always take care of yourself. Your body is very precious.

mail_Freyja_random5.MailContent: The wind feels so soothing today... Yes, the Angel of Clemency's sense of touch is also very sharp today.

mail_Freyja_random6.MailContent: The Heirs of Aida have many secrets, but I bet Hykros has just as many.

mail_Freyja_random7.MailContent: Let's go out for a spin in the new vehicle.

mail_Freyja_random8.MailContent: Today's battles have been finished cleanly and efficiently.

mail_Freyja_random9.MailContent: The mecha has been fixed and is ready for action at any time.

mail_Rabbit_NewYear_Festival.MailContent: Happy New Year! I'm not supposed to stay up late, so I scheduled a mail in advance. You'll come back in the morning to celebrate with Dolly, right?

mail_Rabbit_Valentine_Festival.MailContent: I feel like I'll be able to eat a lot of chocolate today. Lin said I should share them with others. Here you go.

mail_Rabbit_WhiteValentine_Festival.MailContent: Welcome the New Year by having a lively celebration with the most important people to you. Ruby loves today the most!

mail_Rabbit_AprilFools_Festival.MailContent: Why are so many people lying today? Children who lie are bad children, and their noses will grow very long.

mail_Rabbit_Halloween_Festival.MailContent: Strawberry buttercream donuts, peach cakes, chestnut chocolate egg rolls... There are so many goodies. Let's eat them together.

mail_Rabbit_Christmas_Festival.MailContent: I woke up in the morning to find a gift in the hat. Just between the two of us, Dolly put it there when I was sleeping.

mail_Rabbit_PlayerBirthday.MailContent: Dolly and I have prepared some gifts. She said you'll definitely love them. Oh, and happy birthday!

mail_Rabbit_Birthday_imitation.MailContent: My birthday wish is to spend more time with you. Dolly said my wish would definitely come true.

mail_Rabbit_random1.MailContent: Play with me for a while. Oh, if you're busy, we can play next time. Pinky swear!

mail_Rabbit_random2.MailContent: Dolly and I have prepared snacks for the tea party. She said you're the one she wants to invite the most.

mail_Rabbit_random3.MailContent: Is it time to train? Well, let's do our best...

mail_Rabbit_random4.MailContent: I want to become good friends with a real rabbit... Do rabbits like to eat strawberries?

mail_Rabbit_random5.MailContent: I had another dream... Oh, do you want to know what it was about...?

mail_Rabbit_random7.MailContent: When you play on the swing, you swing so high you seem like you're flying. Speaking of it, can you fly?

mail_Rabbit_random8.MailContent: Will there be a bedtime story tonight?

mail_Rabbit_random9.MailContent: Dolly would dream about me too, right? Would she?

GashaponPoolAwardMail.MailContent: Backpack full. Rewards sent to mailbox.

mail_attention_awards.MailContent:
Dear Wanderer, 

Here are your rewards for following us. Stay tuned for more information and events in our community. Thank you for your support and hope you have fun in Tower of Fantasy!

Sincerely,
ToF Team

mail_refund.MailContent: We are deducting [{0}] Tanium from your account as our system has detected purchase irregularities in your account history. Please note that we will continue to do our utmost to protect the interests of our player base and will, as such, mete out severe penalties for all instances of non-officially sanctioned purchases/transactions uncovered. Let us all do our part to ensure a fair playing environment by abiding by the rules of the game henceforth.If you have any questions about this, please consult customer service.
